tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ArtArchive (
  document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  document_title VARCHAR(255),
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  document_date DATE,
  document_description TEXT,
  document_source VARCHAR(100),
  document_image_url VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE ArtHistoricalDocuments (
    document_id INT NOT NULL,
    document_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    document_description TEXT,
    document_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (document_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ArtPhotographs (
    photograph_id INT NOT NULL,
    artwork_id INT NOT NULL,
    photograph_description TEXT,
    photograph_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (photograph_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (artwork_id) REFERENCES ArtHistoricalDocuments(document_id)
);

CREATE TABLE art_documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255),
    document_date DATE,
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    document_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE art_photographs (
    photo_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    photo_name VARCHAR(255),
    photo_date DATE,
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    photo_url VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE artwork_metadata (
    artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    artwork_date DATE,
    medium VARCHAR(100),
    dimensions VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE art_documents(
  document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  document_title TEXT,
  document_description TEXT,
  document_date DATE,
  document_creator TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE art_photos(
  photo_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  photo_title TEXT,
  photo_description TEXT,
  photo_date DATE,
  photo_creator TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE artists(
  artist_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_name TEXT,
  artist_birthdate DATE,
  artist_nationality TEXT,
  artist_biography TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE art_styles(
  style_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  style_name TEXT,
  style_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ArtDocuments (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_title VARCHAR(255),
    document_date DATE,
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    art_style VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE ArtPhotos (
    photo_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_id INT,
    photo_description VARCHAR(255),
    photo_path VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Artists (
    artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_nationality VARCHAR(100),
    artist_birthdate DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ArtStyles (
    style_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    style_name VARCHAR(100),
    style_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ArtLocations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    location_address VARCHAR(255),
    location_city VARCHAR(100),
    location_country VARCHAR(100)
)
